fields.title: Ai - Learn - Find More Tutorials - Footer

descriptions.long: Welcome to the Get Started with Illustrator series of tutorials that teaches you the basic tools and techniques of Adobe Illustrator CC. This first tutorial introduces you to the Illustrator workspace and shows you how to open and save your images.
Learn the basics of creating and editing shapes in Adobe Illustrator CC, including how to draw, combine, and trace shapes.
Learn the basics of transforming and editing artwork in Adobe Illustrator CC, including resizing artwork, using groups, aligning objects, and more.
Learn the basics of working with colors in Adobe Illustrator CC, including how to change color, create swatches, recolor artwork, and more.
Learn the basics of using text in your Adobe Illustrator CC designs, including adding text, formatting, and styling.
Learn the basics of using the drawing tools in Adobe Illustrator CC, including how to use the Pencil and Curvature tools, how to edit paths, and more.
Learn the basics of using layers in Adobe Illustrator CC, including how to create, edit, and organize content.
Learn the basics of working with artboards in Adobe Illustrator CC, including navigating, creating, and editing.
Learn the basics of working with images and effects in Adobe Illustrator CC, including how to add and edit effects, apply brush strokes, and more.
Learn the basics of sharing in Adobe Illustrator CC, including sharing files, saving as PDF, and exporting images.

metadata.title: Create artwork with the Paintbrush and Pencil tools

descriptions.long: Use the Paintbrush and Pencil tools to create expressive, free-form drawings that can be edited and adjusted easily.
descriptions.short: Create artwork with the Paintbrush and Pencil tools
descriptions.medium: Create artwork with the Paintbrush and Pencil tools

metadata.title: Start creating with the Pen tool

descriptions.long: Explore the fundamentals of drawing with precision using the Pen tool in Adobe Illustrator CC. You’ll create straight and curved paths while becoming more comfortable with this powerful tool.
descriptions.short: Start creating with the Pen tool
descriptions.medium: Start creating with the Pen tool

metadata.title: Practice creating with the Pen tool

descriptions.long: Once you’ve covered the fundamentals of this powerful drawing tool, practice your Pen tool skills by creating new artwork.
descriptions.short: Practice creating with the Pen tool
descriptions.medium: Practice creating with the Pen tool

descriptions.long: Edit paths in your Adobe Illustrator CC artwork using a variety of tools and options, including the Pen tool, Curvature tool, and Anchor Point tool.

metadata.title: Create artwork behind and inside with drawing modes

descriptions.long: Use the drawing modes, Draw Inside and Draw Behind, to quickly add interest to your artwork.
descriptions.short: Create artwork behind and inside with drawing modes
descriptions.medium: Create artwork behind and inside with drawing modes

descriptions.long: Use vector shapes in Adobe Illustrator CC to create a logo that looks good onscreen and in print. The best part about vector art is that it scales to any size — from business cards to billboards — without losing quality.
Find color inspiration and quickly create color variations for your designs in Adobe Illustrator CC.
With Adobe Illustrator CC, you can whip up a simple graphic to use as an icon in app designs, web pages, printed pieces, and more.
